alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:35PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Duval, southwestern Nueces, western Jim Wells and northwestern Kleberg Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 934 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Premont, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Alice, Premont, Alfred-South La Paloma, Banquete, Ben Bolt, Palito Blanco, La Gloria, Cruz Calle, Alice Acres, Alfred, Agua Dulce and Lake Alice. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 666 and 706. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
